# CapturedRoomData

**Structure**

An opaque object that holds the raw results of a scan.

## Declaration

```swift
struct CapturedRoomData
```

## Overview

When your app completes a scan session by calling [doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/RoomCaptureSession/stop()], the framework provides your app with raw scan results in one of the following ways:

- The [doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/RoomCaptureViewDelegate/captureView(shouldPresent:error:)] callback for an app that scans rooms using the framework-provided view ([doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/RoomCaptureView])
- The [doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/RoomCaptureSessionDelegate/captureSession(_:didEndWith:error:)] callback for an app that implements its own room-scanning view

With an instance of this structure, your app can:

- Process the raw data into a detailed captured room object ([doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/CapturedRoom]) by creating a room builder ([doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/RoomBuilder]) and calling its [doc://com.apple.RoomPlan/documentation/RoomPlan/RoomBuilder/capturedRoom(from:)] function.
- Serialize to an encoder object, for example, to defer processing to a later date or to defer processing to another device.

## Deserializing a prior scan

- **init(from:)**: Creates captured room data by deserializing the decoder of a prior scan.

## Serializing a prior scan

- **encode(to:)**: Serializes captured room data to the specified encoder.

## Captured Data

- **Merging multiple scans into a single structure**: Export a 3D model that consists of multiple rooms captured in the same physical vicinity.
- **Scanning the rooms of a single structure**: Create an AR experience that enables people to scan a building that contains multiple rooms.
- **CapturedRoom**: A structure that provides the key details of a scanned room.
- **CapturedStructure**: An object that holds the results of the merger of multiple capture sessions.
- **Captured Object Attributes**: Determine details about the objects and surfaces that the framework identifies in a scan.

## Conforms To

- Decodable
- Encodable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
